headline: AI bubble is in its 'mid innings.' But is that really so bad?
summary: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSM) boasts better-than-expected sales for September as third quarter revenue rose by over 30% annually. Even while all these artificial intelligence companies and semiconductor manufacturers are reporting massive growth and investments, is there really an AI bubble forming around markets? Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi has on Robinhood Chief Investment Officer Stephanie Guild and Yahoo Finance senior markets reporter Ines Ferré to help answer this question. TSMC will report its full third quarter earnings results next Thursday, October 16. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
